actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives with respect to use of committee funds for travel.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a Member to include in the itemized report required after a visit to a foreign country an analysis of the extent to which the legislative objectives of such travel were realized. Prohibits a committee from reimbursing a Member or employee for travel expenses unless: (1) such person requests the committee to authorize the travel; (2) the request sets forth the itinerary, legislative objectives, and projected costs; and (3) the committee authorizes such travel by rollcall vote. Revises the prohibition on the use by a lame duck Member of local currencies owned by the United States for travel outside the United States to prohibit such use after a primary where the Member has been defeated for nomination to a Federal office (other than President).

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives with respect to use of committee funds for travel.
